aboutSection.heading: About Me
aboutSection.About_Para1: I am a Vancouver based Photographer with professional experience in Photography. I am interested in creative photography and honoured to be part of any events. Let me help with your special moments to create unforgettable stories.

servicesSection.Services_Para1: I provide exclusive coverage on your special day, be it your betrothal or your wedding or that incredibly special proposal, birthdays and Baby showers. In addition, I cover functions, events and celebrations.
servicesSection.Services_Para2: I also specialize in portfolio shoot and conceptual photography. If you have an idea for a shoot, I can work with you to make it a reality. Make it come to life.
servicesSection.Services_Para3: I also specialize in portfolio shoot and conceptual photography. If you have an idea for a shoot, I can work with you to make it a reality. Make it come to life.
